item.title: Eye on border China fanning intrasect rivalry Ladakhs Buddhist leader
item.description: Gyalwang Drukpa the honorific title of the top Buddhist leader of the Drukpa sect with followers in Ladakh and Tibet has accused Beijing of fanning intrasect rivalries and using the Karmapaled sect to take over monasteries in the holy Mount Kailash area of Tibet
item.itunes:subtitle: Gyalwang Drukpa the honorific title of the top Buddhist leader of the Drukpa sect with followers in Ladakh and Tibet has accused Beijing of fanning intrasect rivalries and using the Karmapaled sect to take over monasteries in the holy Mount Kailash area o
item.itunes:summary: Gyalwang Drukpa the honorific title of the top Buddhist leader of the Drukpa sect with followers in Ladakh and Tibet has accused Beijing of fanning intrasect rivalries and using the Karmapaled sect to take over monasteries in the holy Mount Kailash area of Tibet

item.title: Chinese companies open to making it in India
item.description: More than 150 Chinese companies attended the Beijing screening of Prime Minister Narendra Modis MakeitIndia speech on Thursday seeking opportunities to invest and spelling out their apprehensions about doing business in India

item.title: India to relax visa regime Visa on Arrival to be launched before yearend
item.description: The Modi government is likely to start rolling out Visa on Arrival VoA facility for tourists from over three dozen countries including the USA amp UK by this yearend a move aimed at helping double tourist arrivals over the next three years

item.title: Have an Aadhaar get an instant mobile activation
item.description: Instant activation of your mobile phone would soon be a possibility if you have an Aadhaar numbernbsp Prime Minister Narendra Modi has asked the telecom ministry to work with the Unique Identification Authority of India UIDAI on making this a reality as soon as possible
item.itunes:subtitle: Instant activation of your mobile phone would soon be a possibility if you have an Aadhaar numbernbsp Prime Minister Narendra Modi has asked the telecom ministry to work with the Unique Identification Authority of India UIDAI on making this a reality as s
item.itunes:summary: Instant activation of your mobile phone would soon be a possibility if you have an Aadhaar numbernbsp Prime Minister Narendra Modi has asked the telecom ministry to work with the Unique Identification Authority of India UIDAI on making this a reality as soon as possible

item.title: Cash crunch forces MP to tighten purse strings
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh government has tightened its purse strings to tide over an acute liquidity crisis described by officials as temporary The state finance department has asked departments not to incur expenditure above Rs 25 crore without its clearance
item.itunes:subtitle: The Madhya Pradesh government has tightened its purse strings to tide over an acute liquidity crisis described by officials as temporary The state finance department has asked departments not to incur expenditure above Rs 25 crore without its clearance
item.itunes:summary: The Madhya Pradesh government has tightened its purse strings to tide over an acute liquidity crisis described by officials as temporary The state finance department has asked departments not to incur expenditure above Rs 25 crore without its clearance

item.title: HaldiaKashi waterways gets a Rs 300 cr West Bengal push
item.description: One of Prime Minister Narendra Modis pet projects 1620 km waterways from Haldia in West Bengal to Varanasi got a kickstart on Thursday with the World Bank releasing Rs 300 crore for the initial work
item.itunes:subtitle: One of Prime Minister Narendra Modis pet projects 1620 km waterways from Haldia in West Bengal to Varanasi got a kickstart on Thursday with the World Bank releasing Rs 300 crore for the initial work
item.itunes:summary: One of Prime Minister Narendra Modis pet projects 1620 km waterways from Haldia in West Bengal to Varanasi got a kickstart on Thursday with the World Bank releasing Rs 300 crore for the initial work

item.title: Nashik 2 booked for posting objectionable content on social media
item.description: Offences were registered against two unidentified persons in Nashik for allegedly posting objectionable content on a social networking site against local leaders from various parties including MNS legislator Vasant Gite police said on Thursday
item.itunes:subtitle: Offences were registered against two unidentified persons in Nashik for allegedly posting objectionable content on a social networking site against local leaders from various parties including MNS legislator Vasant Gite police said on Thursday
item.itunes:summary: Offences were registered against two unidentified persons in Nashik for allegedly posting objectionable content on a social networking site against local leaders from various parties including MNS legislator Vasant Gite police said on Thursday

item.title: Navy monitoring Chinese activity in Indian Ocean Navy chief
item.description: Against the backdrop of incursions in Ladakh navy said on Thursday it was continuously monitoring the activity of the Chinese navy in the Indian Ocean Region IOR
item.itunes:subtitle: Against the backdrop of incursions in Ladakh navy said on Thursday it was continuously monitoring the activity of the Chinese navy in the Indian Ocean Region IOR
item.itunes:summary: Against the backdrop of incursions in Ladakh navy said on Thursday it was continuously monitoring the activity of the Chinese navy in the Indian Ocean Region IOR

item.title: 24 people injured in fire at SAILs IISCO steel plant
item.description: Altogether 24 people were injured four seriously in a fire at SAILs IISCO steel plant here on Thursday police said

item.title: SC declares National Tax Tribunal law as unconstitutional
item.description: The Supreme Court today declaredas unconstitutional the National Tax Tribunal Act under which a tribunal was set up to decide taxrelated cases by taking away jurisdiction of high courts in such matters

item.title: Godhra Muslims earn living by crafting dandiyas for Navratri
item.description: A large number of Muslim craftsmen in Godhra city which was the epicenter of the 2002 riots earn livelihood by making dandiyas wooden sticks for Navratri Gujarats most popular festival of the Hindus
item.itunes:subtitle: A large number of Muslim craftsmen in Godhra city which was the epicenter of the 2002 riots earn livelihood by making dandiyas wooden sticks for Navratri Gujarats most popular festival of the Hindus
item.itunes:summary: A large number of Muslim craftsmen in Godhra city which was the epicenter of the 2002 riots earn livelihood by making dandiyas wooden sticks for Navratri Gujarats most popular festival of the Hindus

item.title: Odisha case against exDGP tipped to be CBI chief
item.description: Odishas vigilance department has registered a case against former director general of police Prakash Mishra on charges of financial impropriety during his tenure as chairman of staterun Odisha State Police Housing and Welfare Corporation OSPHWC an official said on Thursday

item.title: With canal and hut India stands up to China on disputed frontier
item.description: Modi was unusually forthright when Chinese President Xi Jinping visited India in midSeptember challenging Xi in private on the question of incursions along their 3500km contested frontier
item.itunes:subtitle: Modi was unusually forthright when Chinese President Xi Jinping visited India in midSeptember challenging Xi in private on the question of incursions along their 3500km contested frontier
item.itunes:summary: Modi was unusually forthright when Chinese President Xi Jinping visited India in midSeptember challenging Xi in private on the question of incursions along their 3500km contested frontier

item.title: India attempts to allay fears on Nenergy radiations
item.description: India made a positive attempt to allay any concerns and fear on nuclear energy and stressed on arriving at a consensus on understanding the effect of radiation on human health
item.itunes:subtitle: India made a positive attempt to allay any concerns and fear on nuclear energy and stressed on arriving at a consensus on understanding the effect of radiation on human health
item.itunes:summary: India made a positive attempt to allay any concerns and fear on nuclear energy and stressed on arriving at a consensus on understanding the effect of radiation on human health

item.title: Liability issue looms over Npower dialogue on Modi US visit
item.description: As Prime Minister Narendra Modi heads to the US on his maiden trip to the country after assuming office the visit is unlikely to bring any major breakthrough in the nuclear energy sector as the government is yet to find a solution to the liability issue
item.itunes:subtitle: As Prime Minister Narendra Modi heads to the US on his maiden trip to the country after assuming office the visit is unlikely to bring any major breakthrough in the nuclear energy sector as the government is yet to find a solution to the liability issue
item.itunes:summary: As Prime Minister Narendra Modi heads to the US on his maiden trip to the country after assuming office the visit is unlikely to bring any major breakthrough in the nuclear energy sector as the government is yet to find a solution to the liability issue
